function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation about the safety and efficacy of UV products","Impact":"Misuse of UV products can lead to ineffective or dangerous strategies for disease mitigation","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to provide accurate information about the effectiveness and safety of UV products","Technologies":"Information dissemination through online platforms, social media, and public health campaigns","People":"Consumers, businesses, and healthcare facilities","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective surface decontamination with UV devices","Impact":"Failure to eliminate pathogens from surfaces, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Development of effective UV dosing strategies for surface decontamination, and proper training on the use of UV devices","Technologies":"Research and development of UV dosing guidelines and protocols, along with training programs for users","People":"Healthcare facilities, cleaning and sanitation services, and public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, industry associations, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and technical expertise for upper room germicidal UV implementation","Impact":"Reduced adoption of effective UV germicidal systems in indoor environments, leading to higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Training programs for technical experts, awareness campaigns for building owners and managers, and knowledge dissemination programs","Technologies":"Training and certification programs for UV system planning, installation, and maintenance","People":"Building owners, facility managers, and technical experts","Owner":"Industry associations, professional training organizations, and public health authorities"}]}
